Package controllers.customer

Class CustomerBaseController

java.lang.Object
controllers.BaseController
controllers.customer.CustomerBaseController
Direct Known Subclasses:
CreateCustomerFormController, EditCustomerFormController
public class CustomerBaseController extends BaseController
Base Customer controller used for initializing UI elements that are shared between the Create Customer Form and the Edit Customer Form.
